validation_notes: Pembrolizumab -> cholangiocarcinoma: FDA-APPROVED (should be GT gap)
Adalimumab -> autoimmune hepatitis: FALSE POSITIVE (TNF can CAUSE AIH)
Rituximab -> glaucoma: Indirect evidence (reduces steroid-induced glaucoma)
